00021 PlatformPlaceholderItem::PlatformPlaceholderItem(QGraphicsItem* parent /*= 0*/) : QGraphicsRectItem(parent)
00022 {
00023     setRect(-WIDTH / 2, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);
00024     setPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::DashLine));
00025

00029     platformText->setPos(-0.5 * platformText->boundingRect().width(), 4);
